description:
New to Overwatch 2? Get the full game experience with the Complete Hero Collection!

Includes:
- All Overwatch legacy heroes
- 6 Overwatch 2 heroes
- 3 Epic Overwatch skins
- 3 Legendary Overwatch skins
- 1,000 Overwatch Coins

Coins can purchase Shop and legacy cosmetic items, Premium Battle Pass, and Tier Skips.
